original_text: Silas has helped me to write this short letter to you. I know that he continues to trust Christ well. I have written to you because I want you to be strong. I have told you how God is kind to us and he helps us. This is God's true message to you. So continue to believe it and be strong.
korean_text: 내가 신실한 형제로 아는 실루아노로 말미암아 너희에게 간단히 써서 권하고 이것이 하나님의 참된 은혜임을 증언하노니 너희는 이 은혜에 굳게 서라

sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 내가 너희가 강해지기를 원하기 때문입니다
